title: Game has begun to randomly crash for no reason.
body: I've played for about 4 years, very rarely had any issues. now all of a sudden whenever I try to play a match, my loading screen loads without champ portraits, and then after about 2 minutes my game crashes. Sometimes I can reconnect, other times I can't and every time I can't my teammates tell me they couldn't remake. It seems to get better if I "warm up" league by playing a normal or two, but the issues persists. I've checked everything, no viruses, league isn't eating up all my cpu/ram, internet connection is fine. Any help you can give would be appreciated.

replies.body: Are you getting any error messages or a bugsplat when this crash happens?  The black screens almost sound like a connection issue, but I need more info on what you mean exactly.  As a heads up, even if your internet is fine you can still have problems specifically connecting to the game server.  Let me know!

No error messages or bugsplat on the first try, it just goes back to the client with the default "the game has crashed. reconnect" message. Occasionally on later tries a small window called "Network warning" will pop up with  "you have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again." Thanks for your help.

EDIT: After updating/repairing my graphics drivers it seems to have solved itself. It hasn't crashed again as of yet, but I'll let you know if that changes. Thanks for your help!
